title: Personal Finance Details
description: Personal finance details such as financial account details, credit score, and tax bracket.

xdm:financialAccount.title: financeAccountId
xdm:financialAccount.description: Financial account IDs assigned to the user, and array of Financial Account Details data type.

xdm:creditCardsTotal.title: Credit Cards Total
xdm:creditCardsTotal.description: Total number of credit cards assigned to a user.

xdm:filingJointly.title: Filing Jointly
xdm:filingJointly.description: Refers to a filing status for married couples that have wed before the end of the tax year.

xdm:filingSeparately.title: Filing Separately
xdm:filingSeparately.description: Refers to married couples who choose to record their respective incomes, exemptions, and deductions on separate tax returns.

xdm:headOfHousehold.title: Head of Household
xdm:headOfHousehold.description: Users designed as head of household if theypay more than half the cost of supporting and housing a qualifying person.

xdm:singleFiler.title: Single Filer
xdm:singleFiler.description: Refers to a taxpayer who is unmarried and does not qualify for any other filing status.

xdm:taxBracket.title: Tax Bracket
xdm:taxBracket.description: Refers to a range of incomes subject to a certain income tax rate.

xdm:creditScore.title: Credit Score
xdm:creditScore.description: Refers to a number between 300850 that depicts a consumer's creditworthiness.

xdm:employmentStatus.title: Employment Status
xdm:employmentStatus.description: Tracks the employment status of the user.

xdm:householdIncome.title: Household Income
xdm:householdIncome.description: Refers to the combined gross income of all members of a household.

xdm:hasAssignedBeneficiary.title: Has Assigned Beneficiary
xdm:hasAssignedBeneficiary.description: Flag determining if the account has a beneficiary assigned.

xdm:assignedBeneficiary.title: Assigned Beneficiaries
xdm:assignedBeneficiary.description: Captures the beneficiary(s) assigned to the account.
